as content as could be

this time myabe for real
this time maybe we'll work

and said

went home last weekend
saw my younger brother
for the first time in 
5 months. boy was that
fun. i miss that little
fucker already. my mom's
birthday was yesterday.
i pretended like i had
to work and went home to
suprise her. i love my
family a lot, and its
taken this last weekend
to make me realize how 
much they really mean
to me. i want to hit 
myself in the fucking
face. why do i still
think about you. it
doesn't happen that
much anymore, but 
every once and awhile
i think about how perfect
you were. i was lucky
to have met someone
like you. i just wish
it would've been in 
better circumstances.
why did i think of you
today? first time in a
month. i guess it should
be the last. you never want
to speak to me again. oh
well. moving on. i'm getting
a new apartment at the end 
of the month. i'm going to
live alone because i don't
want to deal with a roomate.
it'll be for the best. i
actually can't wait. i'm
failing out of school, i
got a job at sears again,
i suck at life. i shouldn't
have started typing on here,
because now i'm just bitter 
and depressed. i just wish
you wouldn't have promised
not to fuck me over, and then
done it anyways.

man

=(

so this week wasn't half bad
nothing during the week
except me getting drunk
thursday i went to midland
and hung out there
don't ask why
the girls just talked me into going
then friday i slept all day
and hung out with steph, angela, and steph's friend at night
for a wee bit 'o time
then proceded to drink myself silly
yesterday i slept until about 7pm
hung out with my roomate for awhile
he really is a cool guy
now that he's opened up a bit
and then talked to heather for awhile
she said she missed me 
and i don't know why
but things were cool
i'm going to go visit her soon
then i got drunk and passed out in my bathtub
where i was woke up
stark naked
not remebering much
today was filled with constant amazment
only a few more days 
until i'm drunk and having sex with girls
in mexico

p.s.
fuck you

thoughts haunting thoughts
time for more

the way your headband wrapped around your forehead
i'm all dressed up
ready for this damned interview
just sit and wait
wait and sit
i'm trying to figure out what i'm going to do this weekend
i'm so glad to not have friday classes
you

it was good talking to my brother again
it was his birthday today
he seemed a bit down
actually
he was crying
he had just gotten off the phone with my parents
poor guy
i haven't seen him in about six months now
it sucks
just when we start getting along
and he is like my best friend
he gets sent to a boarding school
eleven hours from me
eh, he knows the love i have for him
but this is just one of the trivial things in life
its too bad that my problems are so much
less than most peoples
and i make them seem so much worse
job interview at sears tommorow
probablly the third one this year
can they just make up their mind on
whether or not they want to hire me

that show is going to be the fucking best

please
let me know
asap

it was a quarter past four, in the morning
when the storm broke our second anchor line
four months at sea. Four months of calm seas only

lots of ups and downs this past week
actually 
the whole fucking week sucked
i can't sleep due to nightmares
its ridiculous that i'm 18 years old and having nightmares still
i just wish the person in my dreams would take that mask off
so i can see who was killing me
i went home thursday - saturday
nice break from life
had my black belt decided testing to go to
passed 
another thing done
erika came to south bend with me
it was fun
but we got kicked out of the bar area at hacienda because i'm not 21
which was bullshit because i was with a party of 20 - 25 so we couldn't move everyone
fuck age
its just a fucking number anways
e-mails
bah
got to sleep on the couch
because i let erika have my bed
got a cut lip from sparring this morning
didn't think when he said he was going to hit to make me feel it
he would hit that hard
ate lunch at olive garden
drove back to fort wayne with erika
where i sit
waiting to get drunk tonight with some friends
and forget things hopefully
i thought about regret a lot
but i don't regret a thing
bad things in the past only make you a stronger person
good things make you cocky and overconfident
so i hope i get hit with more shit wrecks

in times when i got the best of you
we made promises we couldn't keep
and every night we couldn't sleep.
i didn't know why
but didn't ask questions
because it was the first time in my life
yeah the first time in my life
where I, did something right.

i set myself up for the greatest fall of all time

you pick me apart
while I search for witty things to say (In my defense)
"you'll never amount to anything anyway"
(don't press your luck, don't press your luck)
and think that i'm impressed with your one night stands
and your contagious kiss
i'm trying to get this right
yeah, cause i'm ridiculous like that

i feel so fucking terrible right now. i'm so hurt. i honestly cared about you so much kayt. more than you understand. i would NEVER do anything to hurt you or hurt anyone in relations with you. i've done nothing but tell you the truth. i've been nothing but nice to you. i'm not going to back down when i say that i didn't do it, because i know i didn't. i know i wouldn't. i didn't want to mess anything up between you and i. all week long i was wishing i could fastfoward in time just to see you on friday. now i don't have that. everyday i'd stay up until 3am just to hear your amazing voice. i've been put into the middle of you and chaney and stuck through it. never even gave a thought to giving up. i feel so fucking used. i feel like i wasted my time, my emotions on something that wouldn't reciprocate the same feelings. I trusted you, trusted that you'd be different then most girls. Its ridiculous that you'd even believe bullshit like that. Its ridiculous the way you treated me last night on the phone. Calling me a liar, accusing me of destroying people's personal belongings. Its not fair. You expect me to be sympathetic towards what you've gone through this week, but you don't understand that it affects more than just you. Do you know how I've felt all week? Do you know what its like to be called a liar everyday, do you know what its like to be accused of destroying two people's computers when you haven't done a thing? Do you know what its like to tell a girl how you feel about her, tell her things that you wouldn't have told just anyone, and have her turn her back on you? Do you know what its like to stay up until 6am waiting for a phone call when you have to be up at 8am. Or not sleeping at all because a few hours beforehand someone you care about pretty said you meant nothing to them? I waited for your phonecall that was coming "a half hour later". I'm still waiting. I haven't slept yet. I can't sleep. All i can think about is how ridiculous this whole thing is. How i would never even imagine doing what's been done to someone, let alone someone as magnifecent as you. take what i've said or leave it. it doesn't really matter to you anymore. i just wanted you to know, i really do care about you, and didn't do a thing. oh, and my away message said "it doesn't matter what you say, it never mattered anyway". and no, it wasn't about you. maybe it was about me, did you think of that. because it doens't matter what i say, you won't believe a thing, even though i've never done a thing to break your trust. bye kayt.

<3 phil

i've been lost for words all week. my laptop is broke. this sucks. i'm on a school computer at the moment typing this. i never knew how true it was when my dad said that nothing in life comes easy and the best things have to be fought for. i chose my battles. i decided when its worth fighting for, and when things would just be better off given up on. i don't even have anything to say. i've been a fucking speechless kid all day. i just don't understand how the one person that actually needs to think i'm sincere doesn't, but everyone else does. things can be strange sometimes.
